attributes.action: introduce legislation that requires the Government to be subject to legal sanctions if our Armed Forces are deployed overseas without proper training and adequate, serviceable equipment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers face legal sanctions if they put employees at unnecessary risk in the workplace. Legislation should be introduced that requires the Goverment to be subject to similar legal sanctions when our Armed Forces are deployed overseas without suitable training and adequate, serviceable equipment.
